about_the_game:
Get ready for an adrenaline-charged gaming experience like no other!
Shadowstalk, the groundbreaking multiplayer PvP real-time tactics game, will put your strategic prowess to the test and push your limits.

🔥 Engage in Real-Time Tactics

Dive into action-packed battles where split-second decisions can determine victory or defeat.
With real-time gameplay, you must think on your feet, adapt to evolving situations, and outsmart your opponents to secure triumph.

💪 Unique Survivors, Exceptional Abilities

Select from an array of extraordinary survivors, each with their distinct abilities.
Master their unique skills and synergies to craft unbeatable strategies. Whether you favour stealth, brute force, or cunning tactics, you'll find a survivor to match your playstyle.

🌎 Explore Diverse Locations

Fight across meticulously crafted maps, each offering its own challenges and opportunities.
Utilize the terrain to your advantage, create clever traps, and seize control of key points to dominate.

🤝 Multiplayer Madness

Take on players worldwide in thrilling PvP matches.
Can you rely on your allies when survival is on the line?

🏆 Rise Through the Ranks

Climb the leaderboards, earn rewards, and showcase your tactical prowess as you ascend the competitive ladder.
Regular updates and exciting events, there's always something new to conquer in Shadowstalk.

👑 Become the Ultimate Survivor

The battlefield is unforgiving, but victory is incredibly rewarding.
Will you lead yourself to triumph or succumb to the chaos?

Immerse yourself in the realm of Shadowstalk and demonstrate your strategic supremacy.
Are you prepared to outthink, outmaneuver, and outlast your adversaries?
Join the fight now!

Join the fight now!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.10 / SteamOS 2.0
  • Processor: Intel i3-530 / AMD Athlon II X3 460
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 560 / Radeon HD 5850
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.10 / SteamOS 3.4
  • Processor: Intel i5-750 / AMD Athlon X4 740
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760 / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Shadowstalk

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-530 / AMD Athlon II X3 460
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 560 / Radeon HD 5850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-750 / AMD Athlon X4 740
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760 / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Shadowstalk is a multiplayer stealth game where you play as a hero, or a traitor possessed by an evil spirit, you should escape from various places that are haunted by supernatural dangers using your abilities and items wisely and watch out for the traitor before they kill you.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Portuguese - Portugal, Arabic
*languages with full audio support
